location.header: Where did you apply for your visa?
location.subheader: Was the application made from in the UK or from outside the UK?

contact-details.header: How should we contact you about your BRP?

address.title: What address should we use to contact you by post?

contact-details.delay: Asking to be contacted by post will add a further 2 days on to our response time. If you provide an email address we can get back to you sooner.

personal-details.header: How do your personal details appear on your BRP?
personal-details.subheader: These must be entered exactly as they are printed on your BRP so we can review the problem.

org-details-group.subheader: We will attempt to contact the BRP holder directly. We will only use these details to contact you if needed.

confirm.header: Check the details you have provided
confirm.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

personal-details.header: Your details as they appear on your BRP

confirmation.title: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent an email to
confirmation.email_part_two: to confirm receipt of your enquiry.

para.one: We will review the information you have provided and let you know if a replacement BRP is required.
para.two: We investigate each case individually and will respond to you as soon as possible. If you provided an email address, this will be within 5 working days. If you need to report errors on multiple BRPs, you must report the issues with each BRP separately.
para.two-triage: We investigate each case individually and will respond to you as soon as possible. If you provided an email address, this will be within 5 working days. If you need to report errors on multiple BRPs, you must report the issues with each BRP separately.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.

para.one: If you provided an email address, you should hear from us in the next working day, We will tell you if you need to apply for a replacement BRP.
If you provided an email address, we will contact you in the next working day to tell you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK, you may need to apply for a temporary visa to get back to the UK.
para.three: We will tell you if you need to apply for a temporary visa when we contact you.

parts.three: letters. Your BRP can only show a maximum of 30 letters, so it is shortened to this on your BRP:

parts.one: Is this how it looks on your BRP?

truncated.reason-no: Continue using this service. At the end you can check the spelling of your name, and we shall send you a replacement BRP

paras.one: Due to limitations, we can only print the first 30 characters of your name on your BRP.
paras.two: This is not an error and you will be able to use your BRP.
paras.three: You do not need to do anything else.
